parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Positions

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the position on landscape ([[PositionAGL]]) corresponding to the given point on screen (in UI coordinates).

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''screenToWorld''' screen

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> screen: [[Array]] - Screen position [x,y] (see [[SafeZone]] for more info)

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - [[PositionAGL]], world position on surface [x,y,0]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_wPos = [[screenToWorld]] [0.5,0.5];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[SafeZone]], [[worldToScreen]]
</value></part></template>
